# doubleValue

**Instance Property**

The double value of the slider.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var doubleValue: Double { get set }
```

## Managing the slider’s value

- **minimumSliderWidth**: The minimum width of the slider’s track.
- **maximumSliderWidth**: The maximum width of the slider’s track.
